text: Mandai Khatib Shuttle Bus fare to Mandai Wildlife Reserve has revised to S$2.50 per pax per way. Stops made within Mandai are free though (just inform the bus captain when boarding).

Easy to spot once u Exit from MRT Station. There will be a queue to join for the bus. The fare will be $3/- to Mandai Wildlife Reserve
There was a MWR staff guiding visitors for the bus.

Let's start with the station not having tickets for the Mandai Exoress bus. The ticketing office tells that the zoo told them that people can ride the bus and pay at the zoo, which is confirmed by this sign. I get in and I tell the bus driver that I don't have an acceptable form of payment and I would like to pay at the zoo as instructed, but he didn't allow me in. I called the zoo and they were helpless, they even took my number to call me back but never did. I got a card that cost $5 with a value of $7 just to use $2 value round trip, so I'm paying $12 for $2. I wait for the next bus at 2:20 but it turns out it left 3 min early. I wait for another 20min, ride and pay, only for the same exact driver to allow someone else in. He didn't even say a word to me. So, if you're a tourist, without an acceptable payment method and would like to pay at the zoo, just point at that A4 atop the driver's head if he doesn't allow you in.
Good experience boarding Mandai Shuttle bus here at Khatib MRT.

Need to get your guys to make a shuttlebus waiting room and let the people to board the shuttle bus and droo each MRT station, please get your guys to go to Blk 18 Sungei Kadut St2 729236 and make a waiting room for people to board the shuttle bus and drop each MRT station. So that people don't have to waste their EZ-Link Fare.
